name: SHASVAT MISHRA
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

full_output.summary: As a Physics Teacher at Unacademy, I am dedicated to providing high-quality education and fostering a deep understanding of physics concepts among students. My role involves creating engaging and interactive online lessons that cater to a diverse student base, ranging from school-level learners to competitive exam aspirants. By leveraging digital tools and innovative teaching methodologies, I aim to make physics accessible and enjoyable for all students.

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology
maharana pratap senior secondary school, Gorakhpur

projects.name: Smart Home Lighting Automation System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a smart lighting system for a residential building using Lutron control systems. Developed control system schematics and detailed design plans using AutoCAD. Programmed the automation logic using Python to integrate with voice control devices. Conducted user testing and troubleshooting to ensure seamless operation and user satisfaction. Prepared detailed project proposals and budget estimates for the project.

projects.name: Commercial Building Lighting Solution Design
projects.description: Created a comprehensive lighting control solution for a commercial office space. Worked closely with professors and industry mentors to design a scalable lighting control system. Developed system schematics and product proposals using Lutron design tools. Provided technical support to ensure the integration of lighting controls with existing building management systems. Delivered a final presentation to stakeholders, highlighting the technical and economic benefits of the proposed solution.

projects.name: Traffic Light Control System Using 8051 Microcontroller
projects.description: Designed and implemented a traffic light control system using an 8051 microcontroller to manage traffic light sequences effectively. Developed embedded C code to control red, yellow, and green LEDs in a specified sequence. Designed the circuit schematic, including the microcontroller, LEDs, resistors, and power supply. Simulated the circuit using Proteus Design Suite to verify correct operation.
keywords: Basic knowledge of electronic components (LEDs, resistors)

projects.name: Remote Control Car Using Bluetooth and Arduino
projects.description: Developed a remote-controlled car utilizing Bluetooth technology and an Arduino microcontroller to enable wireless control. Designed and implemented the control system for the car using an Arduino microcontroller. Integrated a Bluetooth module (HC-05) to enable wireless communication between a smartphone and the car. Developed a mobile app (or used an existing app) to send control commands via Bluetooth. Assembled and wired the car chassis with motors, wheels, and an H-bridge motor driver (L298N) for motor control. Programmed the Arduino to receive and process Bluetooth commands to control the cars movements (forward, backward, left, right).
keywords: Mobile app development or interfacing with existing Bluetooth control apps

projects.name: RFID Card Reading System Using Arduino
projects.description: Developed an RFID card reading system using an Arduino microcontroller to read RFID tags and perform specific actions based on the tag's data. Designed the system using an Arduino microcontroller and an RFID reader module (RC522). Integrated the RFID reader to read unique identifiers (UIDs) from RFID cards. Programmed the Arduino to process RFID card data and trigger actions such as access control or logging entries. Connected additional components (e.g., LCD display, LEDs, buzzer) to provide visual and auditory feedback based on RFID card scanning results. Ensured reliable communication between the RFID reader and the Arduino.

projects.name: Automated Shading System for Energy Efficiency
projects.description: Designed an automated shading system to optimize energy usage in a commercial building. Used CAD tools to create detailed schematics and design layouts for the shading system. Researched and integrated various automation technologies to enhance system efficiency. Prepared comprehensive technical documentation and product proposals for potential implementation. Collaborated with a team to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges during the project.

experiences.description: As a Physics Teacher at Unacademy, I am dedicated to providing high-quality education and fostering a deep understanding of physics concepts among students. My role involves creating engaging and interactive online lessons that cater to a diverse student base, ranging from school-level learners to competitive exam aspirants. By leveraging digital tools and innovative teaching methodologies, I aim to make physics accessible and enjoyable for all students.

As an RFID Developer at Identium, I specialize in the design, development and deployment of advanced RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) solutions to simplify and optimize business operations. My practice involves innovative applications and systems using RFID technology to automate processes, improve accuracy and increase efficiency across a variety of industries.

full_output.name: SHASVAT MISHRA
